europeana:record.dc:description: Description of a new genus of Hydroida (Hydrozoa, Cnidaria) from Atlantic seamounts in the eastern subtropical Atlantic (area between Cape SÃ£o Vicente, Portugal, and Madeira). Description of the type of the genus and allocation to the new genus of a second species hitherto brought to Plumularia Lamarck, 1816.
